technologyPartnerships.title: Strategic Alliances for
technologyPartnerships.description: Our predictive maintenance approach combines connectivity, machine diagnostics, and industrial data intelligence through a carefully selected ecosystem of global technology partners — turning industrial assets into connected, intelligent systems.

synox.name: Synox
synox.description: Connectivity is the foundation of predictive maintenance. Through our partnership with Synox, industrial equipment becomes continuously connected and capable of transmitting operational data in real time.
synox.details: Synox Industrial IoT platforms allow us to deploy connected sensors and monitoring infrastructures that collect critical parameters such as energy consumption, environmental conditions, and operational performance.
synox.benefit: Continuous visibility over assets — reducing reliance on periodic manual inspections.

erbessd.name: Erbessd Instruments
erbessd.description: Understanding machine condition is essential to predicting failures. Through our collaboration with Erbessd Instruments, Indusnov Solutions integrates advanced vibration analysis and condition monitoring technologies.
erbessd.details: Wireless vibration sensors continuously analyze machine behavior, capturing detailed diagnostic information such as FFT spectra and waveform data.
erbessd.benefit: Transforms maintenance from reactive troubleshooting into continuous machine health monitoring.

aveva.name: AVEVA
aveva.tagline: Transforming Industrial Data into Operational Intelligence
aveva.description: Data becomes valuable only when it supports decision-making. Through AVEVA technologies, Indusnov Solutions converts collected operational and diagnostic data into clear and actionable insights.
aveva.details: AVEVA platforms enable centralized visualization of industrial performance through intuitive dashboards, analytics tools, and operational reporting systems.
aveva.benefit: Organizations move toward fully digitalized and performance-driven maintenance operations.

page.heroSubtitle: Powering Predictive Maintenance Through Strategic Technology Alliances — where connectivity, diagnostics, and intelligence converge.
page.introP1: At Indusnov Solutions, predictive maintenance is not built around a single technology. It is the result of combining advanced engineering expertise with carefully selected industrial technology partners.
page.introP2: Our partnership ecosystem allows us to integrate connectivity, machine diagnostics, and industrial data intelligence into one unified Industry 4.0 approach.
page.introP3: Rather than providing isolated tools, Indusnov Solutions designs and deploys complete predictive maintenance environments adapted to real industrial challenges.
page.architectureSubtitle: Each layer contributes to transforming raw industrial data into maintenance decisions.

connectivity.label: Connectivity
connectivity.description: Industrial IoT infrastructure connects assets and continuously collects operational signals directly from machines and environments.

diagnostics.label: Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Advanced condition monitoring analyzes equipment behavior and identifies early signs of mechanical degradation.

intelligence.label: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Operational and diagnostic data are aggregated into visualization and analytics platforms that provide clear performance insights.

decision.label: Decision
decision.description: Engineering expertise transforms insights into maintenance strategies, intervention planning, and performance optimization actions.

benefits: Continuous monitoring instead of periodic inspection
Early failure detection and reduced downtime
Safer and more efficient industrial operations
page.valueDescription: Our partnerships ensure that every solution we deliver is built on proven technologies while remaining fully adapted to local industrial realities and operational needs.
page.ctaTitle: Ready to build your predictive maintenance ecosystem?
page.ctaSubtitle: Talk to our experts and discover how our technology stack can transform your operations.

section.title: A Moroccan Engineering Company
section.descriptionP1: Indusnov Solutions was created to support industries facing increasing operational challenges — unplanned downtime, limited visibility on asset condition, and growing performance and safety requirements.
section.descriptionP2: Our approach integrates predictive maintenance methodologies, data monitoring, and intelligent inspection technologies to transform industrial data into operational decisions that improve reliability, efficiency, and sustainability.

page.whoWeAreTitle: Moroccan Engineering at the Heart of Maintenance 4.0
page.whoWeAreP1: Indusnov Solutions is a Moroccan engineering company specialized in Maintenance 4.0, intelligent inspection, and industrial asset performance. Recently established, the company was created to support industries facing increasing operational challenges such as unplanned downtime, limited visibility on asset condition, and growing performance and safety requirements.
page.whoWeAreP2: By combining engineering expertise with advanced technologies, Indusnov Solutions helps organizations transition toward predictive, secure, and results-driven maintenance. Our approach integrates predictive maintenance methodologies, data monitoring, and intelligent inspection technologies to transform industrial data into operational decisions that improve reliability, efficiency, and sustainability.
page.missionP1: Our mission is to transform industrial data into actionable operational decisions. We support our clients in enhancing the reliability, performance, and sustainability of their assets while ensuring operational continuity and effective risk management.
page.missionP2: Through predictive maintenance and Industry 4.0 technologies, we help industries anticipate failures, optimize maintenance strategies, and improve overall operational performance.
page.visionP1: Indusnov Solutions aims to become a trusted integrator of intelligent inspection and Industry 4.0 maintenance solutions across Morocco and Africa, contributing to an industry that is safer, more reliable, and more sustainable.
page.visionP2: We aspire to strengthen industrial sovereignty by developing technological expertise adapted to regional industrial realities while aligned with international standards.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage advanced technologies and continuously innovate to redefine industrial maintenance and inspection standards.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Precision, rigor, and engineering excellence guide every project we deliver, ensuring measurable and sustainable results.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: We prioritize solutions that reduce human exposure to risk while improving the safety and resilience of industrial infrastructures.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Our objective is to generate tangible operational value by improving asset availability, reducing downtime, and optimizing industrial efficiency.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We build long-term partnerships with our clients and technology partners, working together to solve complex industrial challenges.

page.ceoP1: Said Tahiri, Founder and CEO of Indusnov Solutions, brings nearly 29 years of industrial experience across sectors including mechanical manufacturing, naval repair, aeronautics, and automotive industries.
page.ceoP2: This experience led him to found Indusnov Solutions with the ambition of accelerating the adoption of predictive maintenance and Industry 4.0 technologies in Morocco and across Africa.
ceoHighlights: Expertise across mechanical manufacturing, naval repair, aeronautics, and automotive industries
Pioneer of Maintenance 4.0 adoption in Morocco and Africa
Specialist in vibration analysis, thermography, ultrasonic detection, and drone inspection
page.ctaSubtitle: Discover how our expertise can transform your industrial operations.

servicesPage.heroSubtitle: Industry 4.0 & Industrial Maintenance Solutions — engineered for performance.
servicesPage.ctaSubtitle: Talk to our experts and get a tailored solution.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete industrial solutions for all your needs

items.title: Industrial Welding
items.shortDesc: TIG, MIG, and spot welding for high-quality metal structures
items.fullDesc: Our industrial welding expertise covers a wide range of techniques including TIG, MIG, MAG and spot welding. We work on all types of metals: steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and special alloys. Our certified welders guarantee assemblies that comply with the strictest standards.

items.title: CNC Machining
items.shortDesc: Precision machining on 3, 4 and 5-axis CNC centers
items.fullDesc: Our latest generation CNC machining centers allow the manufacture of complex parts with micron precision. From prototyping to large series, we master turning, milling and EDM.

items.title: Automation
items.shortDesc: Design and integration of automated and robotic systems
items.fullDesc: We design and integrate custom industrial automation solutions. From robotizing production lines to installing control systems, we optimize your processes for greater efficiency.

items.title: Industrial Maintenance
items.shortDesc: Preventive and corrective maintenance of your equipment
items.fullDesc: Our maintenance service ensures maximum availability of your equipment. We intervene preventively and curatively, with contracts adapted to your needs and a team available 24/7.

items.title: Engineering Office
items.shortDesc: Design and technical studies with CAD/CAM
items.fullDesc: Our engineering office supports your projects from design to completion. Our engineers use the latest CAD software to design innovative and optimized solutions.

items.title: Metal Construction
items.shortDesc: Manufacture of metal structures and frameworks
items.fullDesc: Specialists in metal construction, we produce all types of structures: frameworks, stairs, railings, walkways and industrial buildings. From design to installation, we guarantee quality and deadlines.

about.title: About Indusnov
about.subtitle: Industrial excellence for over 30 years
about.description: Founded in 1993, Indusnov has become a benchmark in the metal and mechanical industry. Our commitment to quality, innovation and customer satisfaction has enabled us to build lasting partnerships with the largest industrial players.
about.missionText: To provide innovative and sustainable industrial solutions that exceed our customers' expectations while contributing to the development of local industry.

items.name: Marie Lambert

servicesSection.title: Our
servicesSection.subtitle: Innovative solutions to optimize your industrial operations
servicesSection.ctaTitle: Do you have a specific project?
servicesSection.ctaSubtitle: Our experts are available to discuss your needs and offer the right solution

services.title: DronTech
services.fullDesc: DronTech provides comprehensive drone inspections for your industrial facilities and buildings. Drones capture high-resolution images and provide detailed reports to facilitate maintenance and safety.

services.title: AquaScope
services.fullDesc: AquaScope performs detailed underwater inspections for port infrastructure and aquatic installations. Our equipment enables precise control even in hard-to-reach areas.

services.title: EcoScan
services.fullDesc: EcoScan offers energy audits for businesses and buildings. We analyze your consumption, identify losses and recommend energy optimization solutions.

services.title: PredicTech
services.fullDesc: PredicTech monitors your industrial machines and equipment using smart sensors and AI to prevent any breakdown or failure. Interventions are planned before any incident.

services.title: SkilNov
services.fullDesc: SkilNov offers technical training and professional certifications for your employees. Our programs are adapted to the specific needs of each industrial sector.

services.title: SmartFlow
services.fullDesc: SmartFlow optimizes your industrial processes through intelligent automation. Our solutions reduce errors, improve quality and track performance in real time.
